attributes.action: Allow residential property in a SIPP
attributes.additional_details: Allow tax relief on mortgages at the basic rate, this relief would be paid into a pension or SIPP. People renting would also pay a proportion into a SIPP which would be property based and completely TRANSPARENT & cheap to administer. This way we may start to trust investment schemes, at the moment there are too many interested parties intent on fleecing naive investors. There is much more to this idea.
